note: dulceriasdenny.com does NOT have a public API
scraping_method: Would require HTML parsing with BeautifulSoup
difficulty: High - dynamic content, no API endpoints found

example_structure.name: Product name from page title/heading
example_structure.brand: Brand from product details or categories
example_structure.available: Based on stock status or add to cart button

recommendation: This store requires complex HTML scraping and is not recommended for automated data collection. Consider focusing on stores with public APIs like Shopify or VTEX platforms.
